abstract: Tyler Kepner On Baseball column discusses St Louis Cardinals first baseman Albert Pujol's performance in team's loss to Texas Rangers; notes Pujols, who became the third player to hit three home runs in a World Series in Game 3, went quiet in Game 4, going 0 for 4 against Rangers pitcher Derek Holland.
snippet: In a performance destined to be etched in bronze on a plaque in Cooperstown, Albert Pujols produced one of the greatest nights a hitter has ever had in the World Series.
lead_paragraph: In a performance destined to be etched in bronze on a plaque in Cooperstown, Albert Pujols produced one of the greatest nights a hitter has ever had in the World Series.

headline.main: For Pujols, a Game for the Ages
headline.print_headline: Performance by Pujols Rivaled Ruth’s and Reggie’s
headline.seo: For Albert Pujols of St. Louis, 3 Home Runs for a Record Night
